text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , s = 1 , c = 1 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } int count = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < a [ i - 1 ] ) c = 1 ; else c ++ ; s = s + c ; } printf ( "%d\n" , s ) ; } return 0 ; }
